params.period: Number of seconds in the past to start calculating time-weighted average
params.pool: Address of Uniswap V3 pool that we want to observe

returns.timeWeightedAverageTick: The time-weighted average tick from (block.timestamp - period) to block.timestamp

params.baseAmount: Amount of token to be converted
params.baseToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the baseAmount denomination
params.quoteToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the quoteAmount denomination
params.tick: Tick value used to calculate the quote

returns.quoteAmount: Amount of quoteToken received for baseAmount of baseToken

consult(address,uint32).notice: Fetches time-weighted average tick using Uniswap V3 oracle

getQuoteAtTick(int24,uint128,address,add.notice: Given a tick and a token amount, calculates the amount of token received in exchange

userdoc.notice: Provides functions to integrate with V3 pool oracle
